title: Nasty Boys
description: NOTE: This is a previously published work. The title, author, and/or publisher may have changed.Nasty Boys- previously published in Chasing the Dream AnthologyFirefighter by day, sex god by night, ‘Clyde’ chased his dream in Hollywood to be the top gay male porn star in West Hollywood. What Clyde didn’t expect was a little help from a pretty-boy superstar. ‘Blaze’ lights this fireman’s world on fire!
author: G.A. Hauser
